name: Timmy times 100
description:
Oh no ! Timmy just broke into a lab and destroyed everything ! He also cloned himself into many Timmys, so he is not alone to fix everything.

Source code :

https://auroriax.github.io/PuzzleScript/play.html?p=89ff278a991899b937892080f2f3...

Controls :

Arrow keys to move
X to select
Z to undo, R to restart

Music :

Music made by me using Bosca Ceoil.

This is actually the fourth time I made music for a game. The previous times was the game for GMTK game jam 2021 and a very old Unity game I made (Doorz). I think I really improved my music creating skills here.
